@united tomorrow at 6:15 am out of Bologna
@lufthansa I definitely will.
.@united finally got on a bus to the hotel 7 hours after our @lufthansa flight was cancelled.
.@lufthansa here is a line at 11:30 am and they still not don't and wouldn't take people on a shuttle to hotel #Lufthansa
.@lufthansa it's frustrating. Flight was cancelled at 9am and 7 hours later people are still waiting to be rebooked and taken to the hotel
.@lufthansa airport customer service tells us it's LH's decision
@united we got rebooked but giving us all a shuttle to the hotel is another different store
.@lufthansa why can't you take the group that is ready to go? There small children and elders
.@lufthansa we got rebooked but been waiting for 4 hours for ALL passengers to be done before they will take us on shuttle to hotel.
@united my flight from Florence is cancelled and I'm in a very long line to rebook with infant on my hands. Can u assist?
